title: BIR Form 1902 — Application for Registration (Individuals Earning Purely Compensation Income)

fields.label: BIR Registration Date
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR (MM/DD/YYYY).

fields.label: PhilSys Card Number (PCN)
fields.summary: Write PCN as shown on PhilSys/ePhilID.

fields.label: Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)
fields.summary: Write existing TIN if any; leave blank if applying for new TIN.

fields.label: RDO Code
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR if with existing TIN.

fields.label: Taxpayer Type
fields.summary: Tick one: • Local • Resident Alien • Special Non-Resident Alien.

fields.label: Taxpayer’s Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle, and Suffix (match valid ID).

fields.label: Gender
fields.summary: Tick Male or Female.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Tick Single, Married, Widow/er, or Legally Separated.

fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Place of Birth
fields.summary: Write city/municipality, province, or country.

fields.label: Mother’s Maiden Name
fields.summary: Write full maiden name (First, Middle, Last, Suffix).

fields.label: Father’s Name
fields.summary: Write full name (First, Middle, Last, Suffix).

fields.label: Citizenship
fields.summary: Write citizenship.

fields.label: Other Citizenship
fields.summary: If dual/multiple, list other citizenships.

fields.label: Local Residence Address
fields.summary: Unit/Room/Floor, Building, Lot/Block, Street, Subdivision, Barangay, Town/City, Province, ZIP.

fields.label: Foreign Address
fields.summary: If applicable, write full foreign address.

fields.label: Municipality Code
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR.

fields.label: Tax Type
fields.summary: Pre-filled: Income Tax.

fields.label: Form Type
fields.summary: Pre-filled: BIR Form No. 1700.

fields.label: ATC
fields.summary: Pre-filled: II 011.

fields.label: Identification Details
fields.summary: Write ID type, number, effectivity date, expiry date, issuer, and place/country of issue.

fields.label: Preferred Contact Type
fields.summary: Write Landline, Fax, Mobile, and required Email.

fields.label: Employment Status of Spouse
fields.summary: Tick: Unemployed • Employed Locally • Employed Abroad • Engaged in Business/Practice of Profession.

fields.label: Spouse Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle, Suffix.

fields.label: Spouse TIN
fields.summary: Write spouse’s TIN if available.

fields.label: Spouse Employer’s Name
fields.summary: If individual, write name (Last, First, Middle, Suffix). If non-individual, write registered name.

fields.label: Spouse Employer’s TIN
fields.summary: Write employer’s TIN if available.

sections.title: Part III – Multiple Employments (if any within calendar year)

fields.label: Type of Multiple Employments
fields.summary: Tick: • Successive (with previous employer/s) • Concurrent (with two or more employers at the same time).

fields.label: Previous/Concurrent Employer 1
fields.summary: Write employer name and TIN.

fields.label: Previous/Concurrent Employer 2
fields.summary: Write employer name and TIN.

fields.label: Previous/Concurrent Employer 3
fields.summary: Write employer name and TIN.

fields.label: Declaration (Employee)
fields.summary: Employee/Authorized Representative signs over printed name to certify correctness and consent to data processing.

fields.label: Type of Registered Office
fields.summary: Tick Head Office or Branch Office.

fields.label: Employer TIN
fields.summary: Write employer’s TIN.

fields.label: RDO Code
fields.summary: Write RDO code.

fields.label: Employer’s Name
fields.summary: If individual, write Last, First, Middle, Suffix. If non-individual, write registered name.

fields.label: Employer’s Address
fields.summary: Unit/Room/Floor, Building, Lot/Block, Street, Subdivision, Barangay, Town/City, Province, ZIP.

fields.label: Contact Details
fields.summary: Write landline, fax, and mobile numbers.

fields.label: Relationship Start Date/Date Hired
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Municipality Code
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR.

fields.label: Declaration (Employer)
fields.summary: Employer/Authorized Representative signs over printed name, with title/position.
